sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with xie xie 泄瀉① , outflow. Su wen 素問 45: 少陰厥逆，虛滿嘔變， 下泄清，治主病者 , “Recession with counterflow in the minor yin [conduit results in the following]: depletion with a change to fullness, vomiting, and a discharge with clear outflow . Treat the [conduit] ruling the disease”.
② Pathological Condition identical with xie xie 泄瀉 , outflow

②, Lei gong yao dui 雷公藥對 Substance Entry hou pu 厚朴：大溫。主 下泄，腹痛 , “Very warm. Controls discharge with outflow with abdominal pain”. ③ Pathological Mechanism of a disease-caused downward movement of qi that normally moves upward. Ling shu 靈樞 22: 氣下泄，不治 , “ Discharge with outflow of qi. Do not treat”. ④ Therapeutic Approach Combined Designation of numerous different therapies aiming at stimulating excretion, draining liquids, facilitating intestinal passage, precipating qi, and removing extravascular blood. SWBJQYBMJ First juan 上涌下泄，奪其病之大勢 , “Causing upward gushing and discharge with outflow will remove the major strength from any disease”.
